targets.queryText: WITH dates AS (SELECT as_of_date_local, market_value, LAG(market_value) OVER (ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC) AS prev_mv FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT market_value - prev_mv AS value FROM dates;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH dates AS (SELECT as_of_date_local, market_value, LAG(market_value) OVER (ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC) AS prev_mv FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT market_value - prev_mv AS value FROM dates;

targets.queryText: WITH dates AS (SELECT as_of_date_local, projected_monthly_income, LAG(projected_monthly_income) OVER (ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC) AS prev_income FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT projected_monthly_income - prev_income AS value FROM dates;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH dates AS (SELECT as_of_date_local, projected_monthly_income, LAG(projected_monthly_income) OVER (ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC) AS prev_income FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT projected_monthly_income - prev_income AS value FROM dates;

targets.queryText: WITH dates AS (SELECT as_of_date_local, forward_12m_income, LAG(forward_12m_income) OVER (ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC) AS prev_income FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT forward_12m_income - prev_income AS value FROM dates;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH dates AS (SELECT as_of_date_local, forward_12m_income, LAG(forward_12m_income) OVER (ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC) AS prev_income FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT forward_12m_income - prev_income AS value FROM dates;

targets.queryText: WITH dates AS (SELECT as_of_date_local, ltv_pct, LAG(ltv_pct) OVER (ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC) AS prev_ltv FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT ltv_pct - prev_ltv AS value FROM dates;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH dates AS (SELECT as_of_date_local, ltv_pct, LAG(ltv_pct) OVER (ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC) AS prev_ltv FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT ltv_pct - prev_ltv AS value FROM dates;

targets.queryText: WITH latest_date AS (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM daily_holdings), prev_date AS (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local < (SELECT d FROM latest_date)), cur AS (SELECT symbol, market_value, weight_pct, projected_monthly_dividend FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM latest_date)), prev AS (SELECT symbol, market_value, weight_pct, projected_monthly_dividend FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM prev_date)) SELECT c.symbol, c.market_value - p.market_value AS mv_delta, c.weight_pct - p.weight_pct AS weight_delta, c.projected_monthly_dividend - p.projected_monthly_dividend AS income_delta FROM cur c JOIN prev p ON c.symbol = p.symbol ORDER BY abs(mv_delta) DESC LIMIT 10;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH latest_date AS (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM daily_holdings), prev_date AS (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) AS d FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local < (SELECT d FROM latest_date)), cur AS (SELECT symbol, market_value, weight_pct, projected_monthly_dividend FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM latest_date)), prev AS (SELECT symbol, market_value, weight_pct, projected_monthly_dividend FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT d FROM prev_date)) SELECT c.symbol, c.market_value - p.market_value AS mv_delta, c.weight_pct - p.weight_pct AS weight_delta, c.projected_monthly_dividend - p.projected_monthly_dividend AS income_delta FROM cur c JOIN prev p ON c.symbol = p.symbol ORDER BY abs(mv_delta) DESC LIMIT 10;
